text: opened in Hakodate, Hokkaidō, Japan in 1986. The collection focuses on works from southern Hokkaidō, including paintings by Kakizaki Hakyō and calligraphy by , and special exhibitions are also mounted. ==See also== * Hakodate City Museum * Hakodate City Museum of Literature * Hakodate City Museum of Northern Peoples * Hakodate Jōmon Culture Center * Goryōkaku ==References== ==External links== * Hakodate Museum of Art, Hokkaido Category:Hakodate Category:Museums in Hokkaido Category:Art museums and galleries in Japan Category:1986 establishments in Japan Category:Museums established in 1986
title: Hakodate Museum of Art, Hokkaido
